967440.name: Kick The Anime Simulator
967440.description:
Perform experiments on anime girl characters.

squeeze by walls, pass nails, fling cleaver, release all joints, and experiment with bombs. Choose from a lot of girls anime.

You have an unlimited number of cleaver what can you do with them?

You can dance. You have to change the mode to fly the anime. And you can fly them as long as you want and you can drop them.. The rest is up to your ability to test. In this game you can stress as you like. Simple and fun

 Angry at your boss? 
Want to smash all around you? 
Want more kicks?
967440.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
